name: Pretentio
description:
▓▓▓▓▓ DEVISED BY ▓▓▓▓▓

Driftwood

▓▓▓▓▓ MANUFACTURED BY ▓▓▓▓▓

Arro Ganto

"An unparalleled paradigm shift in indie gaming."
- Robin Baumgarten

"It's a reflection of our lives in this world"
- Jeremy Wood

"It's a monolith representing human civilization and endless expanses of the universe"
- Zeke Fulsgard

After 5 years of hard work, it was finally completed during #PostNGJAmazeBusJam

Not available for download due to sensual and ephemeral nature of the content, it can be exclusively experienced in designed exhibition spaces.

Please contact the author if your institution wants to exhibit this work of art
